comments.body: This needs `export =` instead of `export default`. Refer to https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#a-package-uses-export--but-i-prefer-to-use-default-imports-can-i-change-export--to-export-default

I can't seem to get any form of `export =` with namespaces to work (with varying problems, including [this one](https://github.com/Microsoft/dtslint/blob/master/docs/export-just-namespace.md)). If you could give any further guidance as to what else I need to do, that would be great! üëç 

(btw - [the package does adhere](https://github.com/googleapis/nodejs-text-to-speech/blob/master/src/index.js#L87) to the default export syntax, though it's faked using the older module system, does this make a difference?)

Thanks!
Sorry about that. I missed seeing that it does have default property so this should be good. Thanks

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +121,125 @@declare const TextToSpeech: { TextToSpeechClient: typeof TextToSpeechClient };

export default TextToSpeech;
